Plot: Tells the story of a chimpanzee taken from its mother at birth and raised like a human child by a family in a brownstone on the upper West Side in the 1970s.
Title: Project Nim
Actors: Nim Chimpsky, Stephanie LaFarge, Herbert Terrace, Wer LaFarge
tomatoConsensus: Equal parts hilarious, poignant, and heartbreaking, Project Nim not only tells a compelling story masterfully, but also raises the flag on the darker side of human nature.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 14 wins & 26 nominations.
